alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 1:17PM EST until January 09 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lancaster County in central South Carolina... * Until 200 PM EST. * At 116 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Carowinds to near Catawba, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Indian Land, Andrew Jackson State Park, Van Wyck, Carolina Commons Shopping Center, and Community of Almond Glen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for central South Carolina.
